name: Color Cloak (Blue)
description: This silky-blue hooded cloak is emblazoned with a golden Anjali sigil meaning ‘ice.’
item_prerequisite: A pint of blue ichor; soul chalk

effect.effect_description: While worn, a blue Color Cloak grants you cold immunity equal to your level. Additionally, when you are targeted by any effect that deals cold damage, you can use a triggered action to shift a number of squares equal to your level. If you do so, the cold immunity granted by the cloak becomes cold weakness with the same value until the end of the next round. You can’t use this triggered action again until this weakness ends.

name: Color Cloak (Red)
description: This red woolen hooded cloak is emblazoned with a golden Anjali sigil meaning ‘fire.’
item_prerequisite: A pint of red ichor; soul chalk

effect.effect_description: While worn, a red Color Cloak grants you fire immunity equal to your level. Additionally, when you are targeted by any effect that deals fire damage, you can use a triggered action to reduce the damage to 0. If you do so, the fire immunity granted by this cloak becomes fire weakness with the same value until the end of the next round. You can’t use this triggered action again until this weakness ends.

name: Color Cloak (Yellow)
description: This yellow rubbery hooded cloak is emblazoned with a golden Anjali sigil meaning ‘lightning.’
item_prerequisite: A pint of yellow ichor; soul chalk

effect.effect_description: While worn, a yellow Color Cloak grants you lightning immunity equal to your level. Additionally, when you are targeted by any effect that deals lightning damage, you can use a triggered action to cause the next damage‑dealing ability you use to deal extra lightning damage equal to your level. Once you deal this extra damage, your lightning immunity becomes lightning weakness with the same value until the end of the next round. You can’t use this triggered action again until this weakness ends.

name: Deadweight
description: Though this humanoid femur is coated in lead, it feels impossibly heavy for its size.
item_prerequisite: One humanoid femur; one bar of lead laced with starmetal

effect.effect_description: While holding the Deadweight, you fall twice as fast, taking an extra 1 damage for each square you fall (to a maximum of 75 total damage from a single fall). If you fall 5 or more squares this way, you can make a melee free strike as a free maneuver once during the fall before you hit the ground.

name: Displacing Replacement Bracer
description: A wooden bangle is etched with an ambigram sigil of the Zaliac word for ‘transfer’.
item_prerequisite: Petrified wood from a tree that has not been observed since falling

effect.effect_description: As a maneuver, you transfer an object of size 1S or 1T held in one hand with another object of the same size that is within 10 squares. The objects change locations instantaneously and without creating any auditory or visual disturbance. If another creature is wearing or holding the object you transfer to your hand, they don’t notice the transfer.

name: Divine Vine
description: A coil of emerald‑green vines is topped with the jaws of an enormous Venus flytrap.
item_prerequisite: Three withered mundane vines; a tree’s blessing

effect.effect_description: As a maneuver, you call upon the Divine Vine in Yllryc, causing it to extend up to 5 squares from you and attach its jaws to a creature or object, allowing you to use the Grab maneuver at a distance. If the target is grabbed, you can choose to keep the divine vine extended, pull the target adjacent to you, or pull yourself adjacent to the target. The vine stays attached to the target until it takes damage from a strike, the target escapes your grab, or you call upon the vine to release the target (no action required).

name: Flameshade Gloves
description: These finely stitched gloves appear to flicker in and out of reality when first handled.
item_prerequisite: A humanoid’s shadow disconnected from its source

effect.effect_description: When you use a move action while wearing these gloves, you can place one hand upon a mundane object as part of that move action. If the object is 1 square thick or less and has open space on the other side (for example, a door or wall), you pull your body through it as though the object wasn’t there. If the object is too thick or has no open space on the other side, your hand becomes stuck inside the object. Removing your hand takes a successful hard Might test made as a main action.

name: Gecko Gloves
description: These scaled gloves have palms and fingers covered in near‑invisible sticky hairs.
item_prerequisite: Ten gecko tails

effect.effect_description: While you wear these gloves, your grip is all but impossible to break. You can’t be disarmed; you can’t lose your grip while climbing unless you are force moved, and any creature grabbed by you takes a bane on the test for the Escape Grab maneuver.

name: Hellcharger Helm
description: A steel helm is set with two curved ebony horns, a crackling plume of fire floating between them.
item_prerequisite: One broken contract; one ingot of steel
project_source: Texts or lore in Anjali and Caelian

effect.effect_description: Whenever you use the Charge main action while wearing this helmet, you gain a +5 bonus to speed until the end of your current turn. After charging, you can use the Knockback maneuver as a free maneuver, regardless of the target creature’s size.

name: Mask of the Many
description: A plain white mask is lined with soft black velvet— which smells faintly of blood.
item_prerequisite: One used death shroud

effect.effect_description: While you wear this mask, you can use a maneuver to transform into any humanoid of equivalent size that you have previously seen. The humanoid’s appearance reflects the last time you saw them, including whatever they were wearing. Your clothing and gear are transformed into the figure’s clothing and gear, absorbed into your body, or retain their original forms, as you determine. If the figure possessed any treasure when you last saw them, they are duplicated as mundane copies while you are transformed.

name: Quantum Satchel
description: A woven metal drawstring seals this plain‑looking leather bag, which is affixed with an opal brooch.
item_prerequisite: One uncut opal

effect.effect_description: When the brooch is removed from this bag and placed in a container or room, it magically entangles that location to the bag. Any item that can be placed in the Quantum Satchel appears near to the brooch and can be recovered by reaching inside while picturing the desired object. The capacity of the satchel is dictated by the size of the container or room where the entangled brooch is. If an item is removed from the container or room containing the brooch, it can’t be retrieved through the satchel.

name: Unbinder Boots
description: A pair of ornately embroidered leather boots are covered in images of broken chains.
item_prerequisite: One battered gold chain of at least fifty links

effect.effect_description: These boots can temporarily unbind themselves from the chains of the earth, letting you move through the air as high as 3 squares above the ground from where you started. If you end your turn while you are still airborne, you fall.

name: Bracers of Strife
description: Each of these metallic blue bracers is oversized.
item_prerequisite: The severed hand of a giant

effect.effect_description: While worn in combat, these bracers magically double the size of your hands and any melee weapons you wield, automatically compensating for the extra weight. You gain a +2 damage bonus for any weapon ability that deals rolled damage, and a +1 bonus to the distance you push any target with any weapon ability. This damage bonus adds to the damage bonus granted by other treasures.

name: Mask of Oversight
description: This angular electrum mask is set with an excess of eye holes and a horrifying maw.
item_prerequisite: An overmind egg, the skin of any shapeshifter
project_source: Texts or lore in the First Language

effect.effect_description: Maneuver: your eyes erupt from their sockets and multiply until six eyes orbit your head. Gain 360° vision and can’t be surprised. You have a double bane on Presence tests that don’t use Intimidate. Maneuver: return your eyes to your head, ending the additional eyes. While the eyes orbit you, as a maneuver you can launch up to three eyes at one creature within 10 squares; each eye deals 5 damage and is destroyed. You can’t reduce the number of eyes to fewer than two this way; if reduced to two, they return and you can’t use the mask again until you earn 1 or more Victories.

name: Mirage Band
description: A sable blue circlet shimmers with finely woven threads of sparkling white.
item_prerequisite: A spool of mindspider silk, an ingot of white gold

effect.effect_description: While wearing the Mirage Band, you automatically perceive illusions for what they are; you can see invisible creatures; and supernatural effects can’t conceal creatures or objects from you. Additionally, you can project an illusory ‘Hallucination Field’ around yourself and allies causing you all to appear exactly as any creatures you choose to observers. The illusion ends for all targets if a creature interacts with the illusion, if you use this ability again, or if you end the effect. It also ends for any affected ally who moves more than the field’s distance from you.

name: Nullfield Resonator Ring
description: This simple band of copper vibrates slightly when handled.
item_prerequisite: A wafer of gallium arsenide

effect.effect_description: Requirement: you must be a null to wear this ring. While worn, increase the area of your Null Field ability by 1. Additionally, you can deliver a ‘Nullring Strike’: Melee 1 against one creature or object; Power Roll + Might or Agility; 3/5/8 psychic damage (based on result) and the target is slowed (save ends). While slowed in this way, the target takes a bane on magic or psionic abilities.

name: Shifting Ring
description: This silvery metal ring seems to momentarily vanish when observed from certain angles.
item_prerequisite: One-third of a pound of diamond dust, one nugget of pure silver

effect.effect_description: Once per turn, you can use a maneuver to teleport up to 3 squares. Additionally, when targeted by any effect other than one you created, you can immediately teleport up to 3 additional squares.

name: Bastion Belt
description: This thick leather belt features a bone clasp and feels unusually heavy when handled.
item_prerequisite: A giant’s tooth
project_source: Texts or lore in High Kuric

effect.effect_description: +3 Stamina while worn and a +1 bonus to Stability. This Stamina bonus adds to the Stamina bonus granted by other treasures.

name: Evilest Eye
description: A perfectly preserved eyeball hangs unnervingly from a gold chain.
item_prerequisite: An eyeball from a pirate captain who drowned at sea

effect.effect_description: As a maneuver, target one enemy within 10 squares. You and each ally within 2 squares of the target each gain 1 surge.

name: Insightful Crown
description: Shaped of polished crystal, this shimmering circlet shifts through myriad colors in the presence of strong emotions.
item_prerequisite: One measure of pure crystal, a jarred memory of true joy

effect.effect_description: While wearing the crown, gain an edge on Intuition tests made to read emotions and discern honesty. If you succeed on an Intuition test to read the emotions of another creature within 5 squares, you can ask the Director one question about something the creature knows, which the Director must answer honestly. At the Director’s discretion, you might not be able to tap into the creature’s deepest secrets this way.

name: Key of Inquiry
description: A foot-long platinum key is set with three opals.
item_prerequisite: The finger bone of a creature with telepathy, three black opals

effect.effect_description: As a maneuver, touch the key to an adjacent willing, grabbed, or restrained creature and twist 90° clockwise. That creature must answer the next three questions they are asked truthfully and fully. If twisted 90° counterclockwise instead, the creature forgets the last 30 minutes they experienced. A creature affected by the key can’t be affected again by any Key of Inquiry for 1 year. If the key is destroyed, all memories it has erased are restored. Memories erased by the key can’t be restored in any other way.

name: Mediator’s Charm
description: A fancy gold earring is set with a small ruby.
item_prerequisite: The gold nib of a fountain pen used to sign a major treaty or compact, a ruby once worn by a devil

effect.effect_description: While you wear the Mediator’s Charm, the patience of any NPC you negotiate with increases by 1 (to a maximum of 5). Additionally, at the start of a negotiation, you learn one of an NPC’s motivations or pitfalls of the Director’s choice.

name: Necklace of the Bayou
description: A worn leather circlet bears a lizard-shaped pendant of rotting wood.
item_prerequisite: A gallon of swamp water, the limbs of four different newts

effect.effect_description: While you wear this necklace, you can breathe underwater; you automatically swim at full speed while moving; and you ignore difficult terrain created by water or in marsh and similar terrain.

name: Scannerstone
description: This flat, palm-sized triangular stone is decorated with a starfield of tiny gems.
item_prerequisite: A piece of polished obsidian, seven flawless pea-sized diamonds

effect.effect_description: When held against a wall or other solid surface 1 square thick or less, the Scannerstone creates an image floating in the air beside it that shows a rough miniature approximation of the space on the other side. The image displays floors, walls, and other barriers but doesn’t show other objects. It shows representations of any moving creatures on the other side, but not creatures who are still.

name: Stop-’n-Go Coin
description: This small, featureless coin is solid green on one side and solid red on the other.
item_prerequisite: A coin minted during an earthquake

effect.effect_description:
As a maneuver, toss the coin in the air and let it fall to the ground in front of you. Roll a d3 to determine the coin’s effect:
1—Red: The area within 2 squares of you is difficult terrain for enemies until the end of your next turn.
2—Green: You and each ally who starts their turn within 2 squares of you gains a +1 bonus to speed until the end of your next turn.
3—Spinning Coin: Both the red and green effects occur while the coin continuously spins. If any creature moves the coin, its magic immediately ends.

name: Gravekeeper’s Lantern
description: This ancient wooden tablet is inscribed with eldritch runes and stained with dark blood.
item_prerequisite: The powdered jawbone of a powerful spellcaster, wood from a tree marking multiple graves

effect.effect_description: The Gravekeeper’s Lantern can temporarily trap a nonhostile spirit of the dead—either an incorporeal undead or the wandering spirit of a creature who died within the last 30 days—allowing you to interrogate them. To trap a spirit, you must be within 10 squares and succeed on a hard Intuition test as a main action. Once trapped, make a Presence test to coax answers: ≤11: ask two questions, one of which must be answered fully and honestly; 12–16: ask three questions, two of which must be answered fully and honestly; 17+: ask five questions, all of which must be answered fully and honestly. The trapped spirit remains in the lantern for 10 minutes. They remember being trapped and might become hostile thereafter.

name: Psi Blade
description: This wide metal bracer is set with a glowing gemstone.
item_prerequisite: Steel alloy, one fine-cut topaz

effect.effect_description: While wearing this metallic band, you can use a maneuver to project a glowing blade of rippling psychic energy that extends parallel to your arm. While the blade is active, once per turn you can use a maneuver to make a melee weapon free strike that deals an extra 3 psychic damage.
